value:
In my mother's family, only one child
was allowed to learn their clan's
secret sword techniques.$k$pMother may not be around to teach
them to me, but I'll still try to become
as strong as she was!

I don't know much about my
mother's tribe. We lived on our
own—just Mother, Father, and me.

Sometimes, I look at my sword,
and I can almost see my mother's
face in the shine of the blade.

Who here's ready to fight? I won't
rest till I've sparred with all of you!

It's funny. When people see me fight
with my sword, they can tell that I'm
from Sacae.$k$pReclusive as my mother's clan was,
I guess something about our style
connects us to other Sacaens.

I'm Fir, the myrmidon! Now, pull out
your blade and prepare to— What?
C'mon, a quick bout!

I'm going to find my own way
forward. I have to decide for myself
the meaning of my blade!
I hope Mother is watching over me.
*pant* *pant* Best two out of three?

Every day is a chance to reach
new heights!

I'm Fir, daughter of Bartre the warrior
and Karla the Sword Princess. I am
taking my own path in life!

There was a time when all I wanted
was to train with my uncle,
the legendary Saint of Swords.$k$pHe was close to my mother,
the Sword Princess, so...I thought he
could teach me about who she was.$k$pAnd I believed if he taught me how
to master the sword, I would have
her strength. But he disagreed.$k$pHe said weapons weren't what
made someone strong. They were
just tools for taking life.$k$pI was my own person—not my
mother, and not him—and I shouldn't
try to walk the same paths as them.$k$pThen our eyes met, and the look of
misery in his eyes... It knocked the
wind out of me.$k$pI saw the terror behind his mastery.
Every swing of his sword had brought
him closer to drowning in darkness.$k$pHis path was cursed... He was a killer.
That's not where I want my road to
take me.$k$pI don't believe that was my mother's
path either. Father must have seen
more in her to love her so much.$k$pEvery day, I'm closer to knowing who
she was... I'm glad you're with me on
my journey, $Nu.
I won't lose!
Keep watching!
Training brings results!
Just like Mother!
I wanted to do more…
Can you see how I'm overflowing with strength now? It's as if I've been reborn. I want to show you what I can do!
Oh! You got me from behind. How frustrating!
I've had the opportunity to cross swords with so many people here. I can't think of a better way to improve my skill. It's been a real help!
I caught my father crying when he saw me. He was smiling a little, too.
I'm not finished yet! I'll continue down the road I'm traveling, getting stronger.
I wish Mother could have seen me like this.
I want to use this power to help you accomplish your goals.
On my way.
I'll do as instructed!
Let it begin!
